content.text: Match ends, Newcastle United 1, Burnley 1.
Second Half ends, Newcastle United 1, Burnley 1.
Jeff Hendrick (Burnley) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Mohamed Diamé (Newcastle United).
Attempt missed. Georges-Kévin Nkoudou (Burnley) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jeff Hendrick following a set piece situation.
Foul by Mikel Merino (Newcastle United).
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Burnley. Conceded by Ciaran Clark.
Jack Cork (Burnley) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Mikel Merino (Newcastle United).
Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Georges-Kévin Nkoudou (Burnley).
Attempt missed. Jeff Hendrick (Burnley) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Aaron Lennon.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Dwight Gayle replaces Ayoze Pérez.
Own Goal by Karl Darlow, Newcastle United.  Newcastle United 1, Burnley 1.
Attempt saved. Sam Vokes (Burnley) header from very close range is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kevin Long.
Attempt blocked. Kevin Long (Burnley) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jack Cork with a cross.
Corner,  Burnley. Conceded by Paul Dummett.
Attempt blocked. Ben Mee (Burnley) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jack Cork with a cross.
Corner,  Burnley. Conceded by Karl Darlow.
Attempt saved. Aaron Lennon (Burnley) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kevin Long with a headed pass.
Foul by Paul Dummett (Newcastle United).
Georges-Kévin Nkoudou (Burnley) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Burnley. Georges-Kévin Nkoudou replaces Johann Berg Gudmundsson.
Offside, Newcastle United. Ciaran Clark tries a through ball, but Ayoze Pérez is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Paul Dummett (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Mohamed Diamé following a corner.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Jack Cork.
Attempt blocked. Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jacob Murphy with a cross.
Foul by Phil Bardsley (Burnley).
Joselu (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United).
Charlie Taylor (Burnley) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt blocked. Jeff Hendrick (Burnley) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Sam Vokes (Burnley) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ashley Barnes with a headed pass.
Sam Vokes (Burnley) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Sam Vokes (Burnley).
Mohamed Diamé (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Joselu (Newcastle United) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jacob Murphy following a fast break.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Matt Ritchie replaces Kenedy.
Substitution, Burnley. Sam Vokes replaces Ashley Westwood.
Foul by Joselu (Newcastle United).
Ben Mee (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Ashley Barnes (Burnley) left footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ashley Westwood.

Goal!  Newcastle United 1, Burnley 0. Jamaal Lascelles (Newcastle United) header from the right side of the six yard box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Kenedy with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Phil Bardsley.
Attempt blocked. Kenedy (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Ayoze Pérez.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Jacob Murphy replaces Christian Atsu.
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Ciaran Clark (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ashley Barnes (Burnley).
Offside, Newcastle United. Christian Atsu tries a through ball, but Ayoze Pérez is caught offside.
Paul Dummett (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Johann Berg Gudmundsson (Burnley).
Substitution, Burnley. Aaron Lennon replaces Scott Arfield.
Attempt missed. Mikel Merino (Newcastle United) left footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the right. Assisted by Joselu.
Kenedy (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Johann Berg Gudmundsson (Burnley).
Attempt missed. Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left from a direct free kick.
Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ashley Westwood (Burnley).
Attempt missed. Ashley Barnes (Burnley) left footed shot from the right side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Jeff Hendrick with a headed pass.
Attempt missed. Joselu (Newcastle United) header from very close range is too high. Assisted by Kenedy with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Scott Arfield.
